Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Reroute at Clark/Belle Plaine
ShortDescription: 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Clark, Irving Park, Southport and Clark due to street blockage near Clark/Belle Plaine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Clark, Irving Park, Southport and Clark, due to street blockage near Clark/Belle Plaine.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Northbound Reroute near Clark/Belle Plaine
ShortDescription: Northbound 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Irving Park, Southport, Clark, Montrose and Ashland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Irving Park, Southport, Clark, Montrose and Ashland due to street blockage near Clark/Belle Plaine.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:

Headline: #43 43rd Temporary Reroute near Halsted/42nd
ShortDescription: 43 43rd buses temp. rerouted WB: Root, Wallace, 43rd, Union, 42nd and Halsted; EB Halsted, 43rd, Wallace and Root: due to, street blockage near Halsted/42nd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#43 43rd buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near Halsted/42nd.

Westbound buses will operate via Root, Wallace, 43rd, Union, 42nd and Halsted.

Eastbound buses will operate via Halsted, 43rd, Wallace and Root.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express and #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Southbound Reroute near Columbus/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: SB 6 Jackson Park Express and J14 Jeffery Jump  buses are rerouted via Michigan, Roosevelt and Lake Shore: due to, street blockage near Columbus/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #6 Jackson Park Express and #J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Roosevelt and Lake Shore, due to street blockage near Columbus/Roosevelt.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Headline: Yellow and Purple Lines Service Temporarily Suspended
ShortDescription: Service on the Yellow and Purple Lines have been temporarily suspended due to fire department activity

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Service on the Yellow and Purple Lines have been temporarily suspended due to an incident near Howard.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, bus routes such as: #97 Skokie and #205 Chicago/golf, or using buses to other rail lines.

We are working to restore service as soon as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Howard and Thorndale
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Thorndale due to an incident near Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Thorndale due to an incident near Howard.

As a result, trains are operating only between 95th and Thorndale at this time. 

Shuttle buses are availbable between Howard and Thorndale to provide connecting service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
